menu.alt: Assorted delicious cheese and nuts, bruschette with yogurt, pesto and bresaola, and a plate of spaghetti on the marble table
menu.title: FITNESS
menu.descr: The Fitness menu is a new approach to cooking - more fresh vegetables and fruits. For people who are into sports, being active and healthy. This is a completely new product, providing high quality food for a good price!

menu.alt: Assorted delicious grilled seafood, meat and fruits, served with multiple sauces and a bottle of wine on the wooden table
menu.title: PREMIUM
menu.descr: In the premium menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also 'haute cuisine' cooking techniques and ingredients. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a dinner at the restaurant without going out!

menu.alt: Indonesian vegan plate of vegetables cut in small pieces with quinoa and komosa served with sauce
menu.title: VEGAN
menu.descr: Our special Vegan menu has a thorough selection of ingredients - a plant-based diet avoiding all animal foods such as meat, dairy, eggs and honey. Complete harmony with oneself and nature in every element!
